pattern.name: Time frequency
pattern.description: Count of records divided by duration.
pattern.example: Count of visited pages divided by session duration (regularized to avoid division by zero).
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , (1.0 * count(*)) / (max(@timeColumn) - min(@timeColumn) + 1) AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
